infoserver.day0.title: ğŸ“† Day 0 â€” The beginning
infoserver.day0.spiders: All spiders now have potion effects (1 to 3).
infoserver.day0.skeletons: Skeleton classes unlocked with different gear and health.
infoserver.day0.breezes: Breezes have a 20% chance to drop an unbreakable shield.
infoserver.day5.title: ğŸ“† Day 5 â€” First escalation
infoserver.day5.spiders: Spiders now have 3 to 5 effects and may carry skeletons.
infoserver.day5.phantoms: Phantoms are size 9 and have double health.
infoserver.day5.creepers: Creepers are now invisible and electrified.
infoserver.day5.drops_removed: Drops disabled for: Iron Golem, Piglin, Evoker.
infoserver.day5.creaking: Creaking now deals x6 damage, Speed II, drops 3 notch apples and 1 totem.
infoserver.day8.title: ğŸ“† Day 8 â€” Mutation begins
infoserver.day8.ghasts: Demonic Ghasts have 40-60 HP and large explosion radius.
infoserver.day8.new_armor: Hyper armor can now be obtained from powerful mobs.
infoserver.day8.ravager: Ravagers now have Strength II, Speed I, and drop totems (20%).
infoserver.day8.bees: Bees are aggressive, have Speed II and Strength I.
infoserver.day8.endermite: Endermites have 5 effects and triple damage.
infoserver.day10.title: ğŸ“† Day 10 â€” Power infusion
infoserver.day10.skeletons: Skeleton classes upgraded with powerful bows and armor.
infoserver.day10.creepers: Creepers gain Speed II and Resistance II.
infoserver.day10.zombies: Zombies and Drowned wear golden armor.
infoserver.day10.pillagers: Pillagers have Invisibility and Quick Charge X.
infoserver.day10.silverfish: Silverfish now get 5 effects like spiders.
infoserver.day14.title: ğŸ“† Day 14 â€” Rising terror
infoserver.day14.drop_update: Drops reduced: Giga mobs and Cave Spiders.
infoserver.day14.spiders: All spiders are now Cave Spiders.
infoserver.day14.death_storm: â€˜Death Stormâ€™ can inflict blindness (1 min, stackable).
infoserver.day14.ghast_attack: Ghast impacts apply Levitation 50 and Wither V.
infoserver.day14.guardians: Guardians gain Speed III and Resistance II.
infoserver.day14.ultra_ravager: Ultra Ravagers (25% spawn chance), mounted by armored piglins.
infoserver.day14.end_event: End battle begins: Dragon has 1000 HP and regenerates crystals every 8 min.
infoserver.day20.title: ğŸ“† Day 20 â€” Nightmare unleashed
infoserver.day20.skeletons: Skeleton classes receive max-level gear and HP boosts.
infoserver.day20.spiders: Attacks apply Poison III (6s) and Nausea (5s).
infoserver.day20.phantoms: 1/100 Phantoms replaced with Ender Ghasts (with 5 effects).
infoserver.day20.ravagers: All Ravagers are now Ultra, but no longer drop totems.
infoserver.day20.llamas: Llama spit gives Poison III (30s), Nausea (10s), Knockback III.
infoserver.day20.vindicators: Vindicators have diamond axe with Sharpness V.
infoserver.day20.giants: Giant Zombies have 300 HP and drop a bow with Power X.
infoserver.day20.wither_emperor: 1/50 Wither Skeletons are Emperors with massive drops.
infoserver.day25.title: ğŸ“† Day 25 â€” Final catastrophe
infoserver.day25.skeletons: Skeleton classes now reach absurd gear stats and HP.
